original_text: I have used you to destroy men and women, old men, young men, boys and girls. I have used you to destroy men and women, old men, young men, boys and girls. I have used you to destroy men and women,
korean_text: 네가 남자와 여자를 분쇄하며 네가 노년과 유년을 분쇄하며 네가 청년과 처녀를 분쇄하며

sentences.original_text: I have used you to destroy men and women
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 사용하여 남자와 여자를 멸망시켰다
